items.headline: Santander says $12 billion U.S. bank deal will cost less than 7 times earnings. The market isn’t buying it.
items.summary_en: Santander shares fell on Wednesday, as Spanish investors reacted to the banking giant’s latest $12 billion acquisition.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The one market where volatility is rising even as stocks surge
items.summary_en: In South Korea, its version of the VIX volatility index has soared along with its stock market. That’s unusual.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Chase cut my credit-card limit due to lower usage. Will this affect my credit score and lead other banks to do the same?
items.summary_en: “I’m wondering whether this could cause a ripple effect in which other banks might do the same with my lesser-used credit cards.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Novo Nordisk CEO tells investors to expect weight-loss drug pricing to go down before it comes back up
items.summary_en: Recently-appointed CEO Mike Doustdar has repeatedly reset expectations since his arrival. Pricing and regulatory pressure is fierce and pessimistic revenue guidance has seen the stock clobbered 17% in Copenhagen.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen pulls his $8.5 million California bachelor pad off the market
items.summary_en: Allen had listed the home in December, but pulled it from the market after his wife revealed they were expecting a baby.

items.headline: As romance with Jennifer Aniston heats up, boyfriend Jim Curtis lists N.Y. apartment for $1.5 million
items.summary_en: Jim Curtis’ listing of the New York apartment suggests he may be preparing to relocate to Los Angeles full time in order to spend more time with Aniston, whom he gushed about on the “Today” show.

items.headline: Explain this financial paradox to me like I’m 16. Why would I, or anyone, lease a car?
items.summary_en: “‘What’s the point of paying thousands of dollars?”

items.headline: ‘I’m worried about cash flow’: I’m 71 with a $2.7 million IRA and $470K in stocks. Why can’t I relax?
items.summary_en: “My home is paid for and has an estimated value of $700,000.”

items.headline: ‘I’m rich in everything but parents’: I inherited $400K. Is it unwise to use this money to buy a house with my fiancé?
items.summary_en: “I’m a 40-year-old woman in a committed relationship, and I’ve experienced the loss of both of my parents.”

items.headline: ‘I am the third trustee’: My selfish brother is executor of our family estate. Can I retitle property in my name?
items.summary_en: “I am not looking to hire an attorney.”
